body.description: Product Description OUIDAD Advanced Climate Control Defrizzing Shampoo, 8.5 Fl Oz Brand Story Ouidad is the original curl expert with one iconic idea — let curls be curls. For over 30 years, we’ve perfected a unique customized approach for each curl type: Loose, Classic, Tight, and Kinky curls.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Advanced Climate Control Defrizzing Shampoo The first step to preventing frizz Our Advanced Climate Control Defrizzing Shampoo is the first step to preventing frizz. The sulfate-free formula, scented with clean and crisp florals, creates a gentle lather that cleanses hair without stripping it of its natural oils. Fortified with shea butter, murumuru butter, and ceramides, this nourishing blend locks in moisture while helping repair and smooth the cuticle. Our signature high-performance Anti-Frizz Nano Technology with sericin, a protein derived from silk, forms an invisible barrier that blocks out humidity that causes frizz. “Nano” Technology refers to the size of the molecules in the formula, which are small enough to penetrate the cuticle and provide maximum frizz-fighting benefits. Safe for color-treated curls, this shampoo also has a dedicated UV filter that helps protect against damage from environmental aggressors. *Certificate of Formula Compliance issued date: 26th June, 2018 and Authority of certification issued: LEC Associates LLC Sulfate-free shampoo infused with ceramides that removes dirt and excess oil without stripping curls Anti-Frizz Nano Technology provides a frizz free foundation to stop frizz before it starts Safe for color-treated hair Helps protect curls from heat and UV damage

Advanced Climate Control Defrizzing Conditioner Benefits Frizz Control The ultimate regimen for frizz-free, defined curls - in any climate. Anti-Frizz Nano Technology with Sericin silk protein creates a better sealing effect versus traditional proteins. Sulfate- and Paraben-Free Formulas Sulfate-free, paraben-free formulas nourish your hair for healthy, naturally beautiful curls. Gentle Cleansing The formula, scented with clean and crisp florals, creates a gentle lather that cleanses hair without stripping it of its natural oils.

Ouidad - The Original Curl Expert Founded in NYC by world-renowned stylist Ouidad in 1984, the original curl expert brand has perfected a unique customized approach for each curl type. Award-Winning Formula Ouidad Advanced Climate Control Defrizzing Shampoo and Defrizzing Conditioner won Best Pro Shampoo & Conditioner for Curly Hair in the 2018 Glamour Beauty Awards. Customized to Your Curl Type No two curls are the same. Ouidad offers products for Loose, Classic, Tight, and Kinky curl types. Targeted and benefit-focused collections are designed for curls that need special care: Ultra-Hydration, Repair, Anti-Frizz, or Detox. High-Quality Ingredients Advanced ingredients like silk-derived Anti-Frizz Nano Technology deliver results you can see and feel. Nourishing botanical extracts and natural oils create healthy, beautiful curls. The Original Expert Award-Winning Customized to Your Curl Type High-Quality Ingredients

Defrizzing Shampoo Defrizzing Conditioner Featherlight Touch-up Gel Cream Heat & Humidity Gel Featherlight Styling Cream Curl Type All Curl Types All Curl Types All Curl Types (Fine To Medium Textures) All Curl Types All Curl Types Benefits gently cleanses & helps curls look more defined Locks in moisture, nourishes, & repairs The weightless texture combines the soft hold of a gel with the moisturizing benefits of a cream to refresh styles on the go Defines curls with a flexible hold Defines curls with soft, no-feel hold When to Use Use on wet hair to cleanse Use on wet hair to condition This innovative formula is made to be applied on your dry curls in between wash days. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Frizz-Free Locks
reviews.reviewText: Ouidad's Advanced Climate Control Defrizzing Shampoo has become an essential part of my hair care routine, and its transformative effects on managing frizz have truly impressed me. This 8.5 Fl Oz bottle packs a powerful punch in the fight against humidity-induced frizz, delivering results that have made it a staple in my daily hair care regimen.First and foremost, the formulation of this shampoo is designed with a clear mission – to combat frizz and provide a reliable defense against varying climates. Living up to its name, the Advanced Climate Control technology works wonders in taming unruly locks, especially in high-humidity conditions that typically wreak havoc on hair.The consistency of the shampoo is luxurious and lathers beautifully, allowing for a thorough cleanse without stripping the hair of its natural moisture. The gentle yet effective cleaning action ensures that my hair feels refreshed and clean after each use, without the harsh effects often associated with some anti-frizz shampoos.What sets Ouidad's formula apart is its ability to strike a balance. While it effectively tackles frizz, it doesn't compromise on nourishing and hydrating the hair. This is particularly important for those with curly or wavy hair prone to dryness, as the shampoo leaves my locks feeling soft, manageable, and noticeably healthier.The fragrance is subtle and pleasant, providing a refreshing scent that lingers without being overpowering. It adds a touch of indulgence to the overall shower experience, creating a sensory treat that complements the efficacy of the product.I've observed a significant reduction in frizz, even in the most challenging weather conditions. My curls are more defined, and the overall texture of my hair feels smoother and more controlled. The shampoo works synergistically with other products in the Ouidad Advanced Climate Control line, creating a comprehensive system for managing frizz and maintaining gorgeous curls.The 8.5 Fl Oz size is convenient for both home use and travel, ensuring that I can maintain my frizz-free routine wherever I go. The packaging is sleek, and the flip-top cap allows for easy and mess-free dispensing.In conclusion, Ouidad Advanced Climate Control Defrizzing Shampoo is a standout product in the battle against frizz. Its effective formula, luxurious texture, and noticeable results make it a top choice for anyone seeking a reliable solution for managing and preventing frizz, especially in challenging weather conditions. Highly recommended for those looking to embrace their natural texture while maintaining control over frizz and maintaining healthy, beautiful locks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ooh Ooh that smell!
reviews.reviewText: Smells divine! Works wonderfully, and you only need to use a small amount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It made my curls look beautiful. I'm very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Curly Haired Girl Likes It
reviews.reviewText: I have type 3b-ish hair that is long and curly and a pain in the butt to wash- or so it seems. This shampoo leaves my hair feeling soft and easier to run my fingers through in the shower. The price is steep for shampoo, but my hair seems to enjoy this one, so I say it’s worth the price. A little goes a long way with this shampoo, so that helps too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best shampoo out there and it will make your hair feel SOFT and like SILK
reviews.reviewText: I never write reviews but have to comment on this WONDERFUL SULFATE free shampoo by Ouidad. It makes your hair feel like SILK, soft and defines curls and does a great job making your hair feel clean, If you love the product Argan Oil Shampoo, Sulfate Free, 8 oz. - With Argan, Jojoba, Avocado, Almond, Peach Kernel, Camellia Seed, and Keratin - 100% Safe for Color Treated Hair - For Men, Women, and Teens - All Hair Types - Most Beneficial Haircare Product Available and Silk18 Natural Hair Conditioner Argan Oil Sulfate Free Treatment for Dry and Damaged Hair Silk Amino Acids Jojoba & Keratin All Hair Types Women & Men & Teens Safe for Color Treated Hair , you will love this product more. These latter products feel great in texture on your hand though actually did not do what was described for me. This specific OUIDAD shampoo felt and did both. I hope you try it because you will not be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my curly hair
reviews.reviewText: Contrary to the negative reviews I read here, this is the best shampoo I have ever used. I was waking up every morning looking like Don King but since using this shampoo I can go two or three days between shampoos and my hair is still curly and super soft. I will never buy another brand.
Used for the first time this morning. It cleaned my oily hair but did not turn my hair into a huge poof. Also, I like the smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have really frizzy hair the first time I used this shampoo, i straightened my hair and it stayed straight for 3/4 days .. amazing love it
Excelente produto!O meu cabelo está perfeito com esta marca!

Bottle came leaking a bit. Not a big deal as it stopped after I cleaned it off but males a bit of a mess when you get it. I didn't notice a big difference in my hair even after using the whole bottle. Just a regular shampoo
